alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Diego County Coastal Areas; San Diego County Inland Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued November 08 at 9:56PM PST until November 09 at 10:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of Southwest California, including the following areas, Orange County Coastal Areas, San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire, San Diego County Coastal Areas and San Diego County Valleys. * WHEN...Until 7 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Diego County Coastal Areas; San Diego County Inland Valleys
